headline: Reassessing Procter & Gamble After 13% Share Price Drop and Ongoing Price Hikes
summary: If you have ever wondered whether Procter & Gamble is still a buy at today’s levels, you are not alone, and this piece will walk through what the current share price is really baking in. Despite being a defensive staple, the stock is down about 13.0% year to date and 11.8% over the last year, even though it is roughly flat to slightly up over three and five years. This has many investors rethinking both its growth runway and risk profile. Recent headlines have focused on P&G’s ongoing price...
